åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Jump, spin and smash your way into the sky as you battle Dr. Eggman with Sonic and his friends! Sonic Jump delivers brand new, arcade style adventures. Tilt and tap your way through Story levels and Arcade infinite modes. Visit new and classic Sonic levels for hours of fun. Challenge your friends across the world to see who can jump the farthest. PLAY WITH SONIC AND FRIENDS Play as Sonic or his friends Tails, Knuckles, Amy, Rouge, Silver and Blaze. Master each characters special abilities and attacks! AMAZING WORLDS Jump across the legendary Green Hill Zone or take to new worlds including Mountain, Jungle, Blue Sky & Mechanical Zones. STORY AND ARCADE MODES Leap through 48 different levels on a quest to stop the evil Dr. Eggman or Jump until you drop in the infinite Arcade Mode. FUN CHALLENGES AND QUESTS You gotta go fast to beat each level and win big. Every level and both game modes have special rewards for completing special missions. UNLOCK POWERFUL ABILITIES Collect rings as you play the game, or purchase them in store, to unlock characters, power ups and more. CHALLENGE THE WORLD Compete against players across the world to see who can jump highest in Arcade Mode or set epic scores on global leaderboards. CONSUMER REVIEWS - 4/4 â€œWhether you grew up with Sonic or not, Sonic Jump is a total blast.â€ - Slide to Play - 4/5 â€œThe story mode and missions are the real drawâ€¦ giving you a never-ending supply of reasons to keep jumping for the top.â€ - Digital Spy - 8/10 â€œSonic Jump is an enjoyable little gem that took me by surprise.â€ - App Gamer - 4/5 â€œSega has made Sonic Jump a proper standalone game well worth it for both fans, and non-fans of Sonic the Hedgehog.â€ - TouchGen - - - - - Privacy Policy: https://privacy.sega.com/en/sega-of-america-inc-privacy-policy Terms of Use: http://www.sega.com/terms Game apps are ad-supported and no in-app purchases are required to progress; ad-free play option available with in-app purchase. This game may include "Interest Based Ads" (please see http://www.sega.com/mprivacy#3IBADiscolure for more information)â€‹ and may collect "Precise Location Data" â€‹(please see http://www.sega.com/mprivacy#5LocationDataDisclosure â€‹for more information)â€‹. entry.title: Codenames
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 38.00 â†’ HK$Â 18.00 [HK$Â 18.00 ~ HK$Â 38.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 18.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket. A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking --------------------------------------------------- Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone. Inspired by the Iconic Board Game ---------------------------------- Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada ChvÃ¡til, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon. More Content, More Fun ------------------------- While staying true to the originalâ€™s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames. Play Anytime, Anywhere ------------------------ With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges. Build Your Secret Agent Career ------------------------------- Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster! Connect and Compete with Friends ----------------------------------- Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words. Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

Live sound with its true feelings. Enjoy recording, playback and audio editing with Voice Recorder. We have fine tuned it for your day-to-day activities. Attending something important and want to record it for later playback, Voice Recorder will allow you to record your meetings, lectures, and other events with codec noise reduction technology. You can record anything within 10-100 meters around you. Edit the recording as per your need and save it for later playback. Voice Recorder has multiple playback options helping you decide how you want to hear your recording. Developed specially for Apple, it plays just as excellent with Apple EarPods as it plays with our old earphones. You can auto upload and even share the recording on cloud (Dropbox) in seconds. Voice Recorder is an easy to use and handy app to record the meeting, lecture, music and many more. The interface is designed to make it quick. With single tap you can record and share the recordings. Enjoy sound, record, edit, play and listen! List of Features # Audio Recorder - Quality options: (Low:8KHz, Medium:22.05KHz, High:44.1KHz) - Format options: (WAV, CAF, M4A) - External input device support : Bluetooth Mic, Other External Mic (Tested with Tascam mic) - Background recording support (New) - Continue recording into existing recordings. - Call Interruption handling - Recording will continue after a call or other interruption. # Audio Player - Quick audio player - Playback controls (Fast backward, Fast backward) - External output device support (Bluetooth and External speaker devices) - Background audio playing # Audio Trimming - Select a part of recording and trim it. # Sharing - Email recordings - Dropbox sharing (Auto upload recording support) - Upload to iCloud Drive - Import recordings to computer with iTunes file sharing - Airdrop sharing with iOS and Mac devices. # Universal App - Support for both iPhone and iPad devices. # AVAILABLE IN 11 DIFFERENT LANGUAGE English, EspaÃ±ol, FranÃ§ais, Deutsch, PortuguÃªs (Br.),PortuguÃªs, Italiano, ä¸­æ–‡ (Simplified), Ğ ÑƒÑÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹, æ—¥æœ¬èª, í•œêµ­ì–´
